subject: Archive the deprecate-project-workflow plan
description: 1. Create folder plans/completed/deprecate-project-workflow 2. Rename plan to deprecate-project-workflow.md 3. Move into plans/completed/deprecate-project-workflow/ 4. Read session IDs from the plan's Sessions section 5. For each session ID, move ~/.claude/tasks/<session-id> to plans/completed/deprecate-project-workflow/tasks/ 6. Update any "in_progress" tasks to "completed" 7. Commit changes 8. Push to PR. Verification: `ls plans/completed/deprecate-project-workflow/deprecate-project-workflow.md` â†’ exists
